TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Partitioner extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides common partitioning strategies for arrays, lists, and enumerables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: Type of the elements in source enumerable.
Docs.summary: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.
Docs.returns: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable. For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source, valuetype System.Collections.Concurrent.EnumerablePartitionerOptions partitionerOptions) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: Type of the elements in source enumerable.
Docs.param: Options to control the buffering behavior of the partitioner.
Docs.summary: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.
Docs.returns: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable.

Docs.exception: The argument specifies an invalid value for .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IList<TSource> list, bool loadBalance);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!TSource> list, bool loadBalance) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: Type of the elements in source list.
Docs.param: A Boolean value that indicates whether the created partitioner should dynamically load balance between partitions rather than statically partition.
Docs.summary: Creates an orderable partitioner from an instance.
Docs.returns: An orderable partitioner based on the input list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).
